net.openhft.chronicle.map

Class UdpReplicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.map.UdpReplicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Replica.ModificationNotifier

    public class UdpReplicator
extends Object
implements Replica.ModificationNotifier, Closeable
    The UdpReplicator attempts to read the data ( but it does not enforce or grantee delivery ), typically, you should use the UdpReplicator if you have a large number of nodes, and you wish to receive the data before it becomes available on TCP/IP. In order to not miss data, UdpReplicator should be used in conjunction with the TCP Replicator.
